briefTitle: Safety Study of Herpes Simplex Vaccine in HSV Seronegative and Seropositive Females Between 10 and 17 Years Old
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Herpes Simplex Candidate Vaccine (gD2-AS04) in Healthy HSV Seronegative and Seropositive Female Subjects Aged 10-17 Years.
summary:
Main goal of this study is to compare the occurrence of serious adverse events (SAEs) between the herpes simplex (gD2-AS04) vaccine group and the Saline control group throughout the study period (up to month 12).

The Protocol Posting has been updated in order to comply with the FDA Amendment Act, Sep 2007.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
